pageProduct.name: Schick Quattro Women Kit
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A Shave So Smooth You Can Skip a Day!

The Schick® Quattro for Women® Razor offers a shave so smooth you can skip a day!

With its pivoting, 4 ultra-thin blades the razor provides flexibility and an effortless glide along the contours of your legs and body. The easy-to-grip rubber handle feels comfortable and balanced in your hand; while the conditioning strip enhanced with Aloe & Vitamin E helps to reduce irritation, for a shave so smooth you can skip a day! A Shave So Smoo

Boxed Contents: 1 x razor, 2 x blades

Warnings

Blades are sharp tools, please handle with care.
Keep away from children.
